--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> Firestrike snapped back.  
> "Don't worry bout my face, I think about more things than my looks.  
> You should too then maybe you wouldn't have looked jsut like that 
> after every battle, especially when you couldn't even kill off 
> Optimus."

::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    Domnijoe suddenly became defensive and with one swift motion, drew 
her Lazer Sabre out of her subspace pocket. She knew Meggy could 
handle himself, but no...BUG... was gonna diss her commander! And by 
golly...She was just getting re-aquanted with her old leader. She 
didn't need some idiot getting in the way..AGAIN!!
    "I'd watch what you say to him..." she grumbled to Firestrike.
    It was Blindchaos that made her lower her weapon.
    "It's their fight." he said firmly. He winked at her, his humor 
still bright through his stubornness. "And even with half a head 
Megatron still looks cute."

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

****************************
